commit message: Resize camera view to actual size of preview image
added LibraryActivity which shows all CamTimer pictures in a grid, and a cache to quickly display thumbnails
Improve library grid display, allow deleting pictures, revise buttons on main screen
Hopefully fixing problem with Droid and other phones hanging in the middle of taking 4 pictures, cleaned up code and fixed several lint warnings.
made ScaledBitmapCache more flexible by allowing users to specify where thumbnails should be stored, rather than always using 'thumbnails' directory
load thumbnails in grid view asynchronously for smoother performance
Updated version to 1.2.2, made camera not required for Nexus 7 compatibility.
send NEW_PICTURE broadcast intent when saving picture
Fix upside down images on Nexus 5x and 6.
